subject: Basketball (College)
Basketball
Halls of Fame
Coaches and Managers
organizations: New York City Basketball Hall of Fame
lead_paragraph: Bob McKillop, who groomed Stephen Curry for the N.B.A. as the coach of Davidson College, was named to the Class of 2015 inductees to the New York City Basketball Hall of Fame.
snippet: Bob McKillop, who groomed Stephen Curry for the N.B.A. as the coach of Davidson College, was named to the Class of 2015 inductees to the New York City Basketball Hall of Fame.
